credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Design for a Bronze Candlestick
provenance: F. Renaud (Lugt 1042); Leon Decloux (acquired by l906).
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and gray, yellow and brown wash on paper, lined with paper mount with monogram FR and gilt border
description: The design for the candlestick is positioned at the center of the sheet.  The shaft of the candle stick is composed of a winged female figure (the genius of Peace) standing beside a gun barrel, positioned vertically, and which supports the socket with a burning candle.  The female figure has the right foot on a staff with a crescent.  A ring of grenades support the base.
name: Drawing
